trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$xxxx$ xxxxxx$xxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter accepts null values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if null values are accepted; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the source column is nullable; false if it is not.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of digits used to represent the Value property of a data provider Parameter object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is 0, which indicates that a data provider sets the precision for Value.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx 0$ xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Resets the DbType property to its original settings.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx $xxxxxx$XxXxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
